ygData.subject: Re: Benefits/Downfalls of Monks?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve discovered that with monks-- you just don t earn enough money to properly venture forth. Carry weight heavily penalizes you. I abandoned my monk for later
ygData.messageBody:
I've discovered that with monks-- you just don't
earn enough money to properly venture forth. Carry
weight heavily penalizes you. I abandoned my monk for
later play when I can afford to say... "No loot for me
plz". <br><br>Iskar monk at level 7 and I was carrying
all the stuff I could b/c I'm a poor boy.
Heh.<br><br>Anyway... you're right. It's a hard class to play to me b/c
of the money issues. But you hit often with a monk
and can mend (which has caused myself to die before
though... OUCH-- crit fails on mend STINK!).
<br><br>Anyway... every class has its ups and downs. I like
warriors vs Monks b/c Warriors can take hits... but monks
are nice damage. And they've got a really nice AC
bonus for being under 14 stone. (not that I used that
really. Sigh... darned I'm a poor character.
LOL)<br><br>shooman out... aka FatedHue Druid of Drinal in his 22nd
Rank.
